posts.title: living as I like a.k.a Life is awesome
posts.mobiledoc:
{  "version": "0.3.1",  "markups": [],  "atoms": [],  "cards": [    ["card-markdown", {      "cardName": "card-markdown",      "markdown": "
Did I make a mistake on living like the way I want to rather than looking for from the people? *I guess not* but still Why do I feel like Iâ€™m lot behind all and I lost self-respect!

**Iâ€™m not a big fan of people living on others words and choices.** Also Iâ€™m not a big fan of people intruding in others life and *judging othersâ€™ actions* and all.

> Why donâ€™t they look for themselves and lead a good life!
> >  
What is that theyâ€™re gaining from these kinda sadist attitude, *guess Iâ€™ll never know.*

btw people have a perception about me that **I FLAUNT** too much, hehe lol ðŸ™‚ Maybe theyâ€™re right or maybe theyâ€™re wrong but **what gives!**

*Itâ€™s only a life thatâ€™s given to us, so why not use it to the fullest!*

**flaunt a little, enjoy a little, be crazy for a little, and moreover live the way you like.**

**-A**


"    }]  ],  "sections": [[10, 0]]}
posts.html:
Did I make a mistake on living like the way I want to rather than looking for from the people? I guess not but still Why do I feel like Iâ€™m lot behind all and I lost self-respect!

Iâ€™m not a big fan of people living on others words and choices. Also Iâ€™m not a big fan of people intruding in others life and judging othersâ€™ actions and all.

Why donâ€™t they look for themselves and lead a good life!

What is that theyâ€™re gaining from these kinda sadist attitude, guess Iâ€™ll never know.

btw people have a perception about me that I FLAUNT too much, hehe lol ðŸ™‚ Maybe theyâ€™re right or maybe theyâ€™re wrong but what gives!

Itâ€™s only a life thatâ€™s given to us, so why not use it to the fullest!

flaunt a little, enjoy a little, be crazy for a little, and moreover live the way you like.

-A

posts.title: The pursuit of Happiness

{"version":"0.3.1","markups":[],"atoms":[],"cards":[["card-markdown",{"cardName":"card-markdown","markdown":"
Itâ€™s with great happiness that find myself writing this. I never thought I could perform a *bit better* than I used to be in one of the game which I *actually* was **afraid** of. By afraid I mean Itâ€™s a game with a lot of co-players you know, so everytime I make a fool of myself in front of everyone, I somehow actually made my mind to hate the game slowly. But guess what, with all the *teasing* and *insulting* and *criticizing*, Iâ€™m now starting to learn more and trying to be much focussed at instants. *Kidding though.*

That doesnâ€™t mean Iâ€™m way better now. **ðŸ™‚** Iâ€™m trying at least.*(lol)*

Maybe just maybe, someday I could look back and say **Hey I wasnâ€™t AFRAIDâ€¦.**

â€“**A**


"}]],"sections":[[10,0]]}

posts.title: F Me
posts.mobiledoc:
{  "version": "0.3.1",  "markups": [],  "atoms": [],  "cards": [    ["card-markdown", {      "cardName": "card-markdown",      "markdown": "
**Priories**, The Only fâ€™kin thing that *matters*.

The thing that *tears* the paper apart

Too bad everyoneâ€™s a part of this so called era of *priorities*, *selfishness*, and most importantly the era where people take **things for granted.**

Shouldâ€™ve known that all are *same*

One I love told me to find someone *worthy*, **to talk to.**

Too bad I lost her **too**.

Let her have her priorities seeking whatâ€™s best for her, I donâ€™t complain

Wish I knew it sooner *that* it is what it is.

**su*ks** isnâ€™t it when the world you see just **<u>flip</u>** with you standing there unaffected.

The turns life take, **Awesome**.

All the best to **me** in finding the things I seek in the random distorted world with so called prioritizing creatures

Life **su*ks**

Trust me

**<u>Life fkin sucks</u>**

â€“**A**


"    }]  ],  "sections": [[10, 0]]}

posts.title: Silence
posts.mobiledoc:
{"version":"0.3.1","markups":[],"atoms":[],"cards":[["card-markdown",{"cardName":"card-markdown","markdown":"
The word so close to **Fear**, or maybe that which troubles us to feel fear.

When the whole world stands still and then we hear the *clockâ€™s ticking*, that when **dark**, *shades our mind* and **fear** takes it as a whole making us *see* where we **stand**.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ZJkamsEwato?rel=0" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>

When the **silence** hits our ears, shall we have a feeling of *something strange*, or the sense of *wrong,* dripping with **perspiration**.

* Has it ever occurred to you something like that, like when itâ€™s all silent around you and then you starts to sweat and some thoughts starts rushing to your mind from nowhere, making you feel like youâ€™re lost and left far behind everything?

Maybe not.

But I have had that sensation.

> **Listen to the silence**

*ehh listen to silence huh? You probably are wondering.*

**Yeah** thereâ€™s a lot of voice within the silence but shall only be heard by the oneâ€™s whoâ€™s actually listening to the silence.

*There shall be no fear in the mist of silence if you of all are going with it*

â€“**A**


"}]],"sections":[[10,0]]}

When the silence hits our ears, shall we have a feeling of something strange, or the sense of wrong, dripping with perspiration.

  • Has it ever occurred to you something like that, like when itâ€™s all silent around you and then you starts to sweat and some thoughts starts rushing to your mind from nowhere, making you feel like youâ€™re lost and left far behind everything?

There shall be no fear in the mist of silence if you of all are going with it

â€“A

posts.title: Pity, Sorry, Forgive
posts.mobiledoc:
{"version":"0.3.1","markups":[],"atoms":[],"cards":[["card-markdown",{"cardName":"card-markdown","markdown":"
yet another **hashtag** added to the list.

AND?? *Is this cycle gonna end someday!!!*

So we want *our country* to be *known for* this kinda ***shame***! *Alright then*.

**DUMB COUNTRY** of **FILTHY MUD-HEAD B*tches** as of now.

![GBWA-20180413143647-01](/content/images/2018/06/GBWA-20180413143647-01.jpg)

she was just an 8 year old and you all did this to her, that poor little girl.

> **<u>Pity</u>** on you all

*What if it happened to your child instead!*

Itâ€™s not just you few who did this to her, we all were a part of the unfortunate crime. We chose this to happen when we were busy planning on making Huge Statues of the dead, fighting over parties, instead of thinking about to make for the betterment and safety. **Alas!**

> **<u>Sorry</u>** that we did this to you sister

Too bad that our mind is so dark that our actions drive us to what we do.

*They say it is what it is and whatâ€™s done is done but why is it still not changing considering this, not the first time in India*

> <u>**Forgive**</u> us for whatâ€™s done

Too much to wish for.

*But forgive us for being the reason that you went through this misery at this age.*

**Forgive us for crushing your poor soul, taking the life out of you child.**

*Is this going to be the last*? I presume not coz **itâ€™s our country** after all.

-> *Donâ€™t make this about about just the government or the parties. 
-> Donâ€™t make this about Men vs Women. 
-> Make this about **Us** against the monsters out there within us.*

I seriously canâ€™t bear seeing another picture of you with the pretty face of yours torn apart.

*May you rest in peace little sister.*

![GBWA-20180413132659](/content/images/2018/06/GBWA-20180413132659.jpg)

Not gonna use the **J** word anyway

**-A**


"}]],"sections":[[10,0]]}

posts.title: Faces
posts.mobiledoc:
{"version":"0.3.1","markups":[],"atoms":[],"cards":[["card-markdown",{"cardName":"card-markdown","markdown":"[]()Strange thing happened today. **I forgot faces.**
Sounds funny I know but it's true and quite a lot embarrassing. 
How can I forget faces of people I know or at least I used to know so easily at my 20's!!

I was embarrassed when those 2 friends asked me if I didn't recognise them at all. One of them I see usually in the bus while on the way to college and the other I see while on bus back to home. 

Seriously this is the second time I'm up with this issue. 
Am I forgetting things so easily. 

I can't say I didn't expect this as nowadays I spend most of the time in my room engaging in things I love.

Embarrassing was it, quite embarrassing.

You may be wondering why write a blog for this right!
WHOOPAH

"}]],"sections":[[10,0]]}

posts.title: untitled
posts.mobiledoc:
{"version":"0.3.1","markups":[],"atoms":[],"cards":[["card-markdown",{"cardName":"card-markdown","markdown":"- You **should** live a life that you may wanna live to please all the people in the world. 
- You **should** do things for the people who can go behind your back.
- You **should** swim ocean for people who won't even cross a bridge for you.
- You **should** trust everyone blindly.
- You **should** expect things from everyone.
- You **should** be friends mean people.
- You **shouldn't** love anyone unconditionally but yourself.
- You **shouldn't** feel pain in anyway.

**You wanna know why!**

- You should live a life that you may wanna live to please all the people in the world **then only you'll understand that there's more to life much more enjoyable than living a life to please everyone.**
- You should do things for the people who can go behind your back **that makes you understand people's true double faced fickle mindedness.**
- You should swim ocean for people who won't even cross a bridge for you **that way reality hits and leaves you broken like the leaf fell from the tree.**
- You should trust everyone blindly **that way you'll know the pain that comes with it.**
- You should expect things from everyone **which when they fail you, you get to know that expectations hurt and things n people are temporary.**
- You should be friends with mean people **as then you can see how ruthlessly they can bring you to rockbottom.**
- You shouldn't love anyone unconditionally but yourself **that way when people you love leave you, you won't be left in vain.**
- You shouldn't feel pain in anyway coz if you do feel it, it'll make you **do** *the* **dont's** and **not do** *the* **do's** as I told here.


Do/Don't. 
It's our choice that leads life to take turns. 
*Choose happiness over anything. In the end it is what matters and **you** of all the people in world **deserve to love and to be loved to the fullest.***"}]],"sections":[[10,0]]}
posts.html:
• You should live a life that you may wanna live to please all the people in the world.
  • You should do things for the people who can go behind your back.
  • You should swim ocean for people who won't even cross a bridge for you.
  • You should trust everyone blindly.
  • You should expect things from everyone.
  • You should be friends mean people.
  • You shouldn't love anyone unconditionally but yourself.
  • You shouldn't feel pain in anyway.

You wanna know why!

  • You should live a life that you may wanna live to please all the people in the world then only you'll understand that there's more to life much more enjoyable than living a life to please everyone.
  • You should do things for the people who can go behind your back that makes you understand people's true double faced fickle mindedness.
  • You should swim ocean for people who won't even cross a bridge for you that way reality hits and leaves you broken like the leaf fell from the tree.
  • You should trust everyone blindly that way you'll know the pain that comes with it.
  • You should expect things from everyone which when they fail you, you get to know that expectations hurt and things n people are temporary.
  • You should be friends with mean people as then you can see how ruthlessly they can bring you to rockbottom.
  • You shouldn't love anyone unconditionally but yourself that way when people you love leave you, you won't be left in vain.
  • You shouldn't feel pain in anyway coz if you do feel it, it'll make you do the dont's and not do the do's as I told here.

Do/Don't.
It's our choice that leads life to take turns.
Choose happiness over anything. In the end it is what matters and you of all the people in world deserve to love and to be loved to the fullest.
posts.plaintext:

 * You shouldn't  love anyone unconditionally but yourself.
 * You shouldn't  feel pain in anyway.

You wanna know why!

 * You should live a life that you may wanna live to please all the people in
   the world then only you'll understand that there's more to life much more
   enjoyable than living a life to please everyone.
 * You should do things for the people who can go behind your back that makes
   you understand people's true double faced fickle mindedness.
 * You should swim ocean for people who won't even cross a bridge for you that
   way reality hits and leaves you broken like the leaf fell from the tree.
 * You should trust everyone blindly that way you'll know the pain that comes
   with it.
 * You should expect things from everyone which when they fail you, you get to
   know that expectations hurt and things n people are temporary.
 * You should be friends with mean people as then you can see how ruthlessly
   they can bring you to rockbottom.
 * You shouldn't love anyone unconditionally but yourself that way when people
   you love leave you, you won't be left in vain.
 * You shouldn't feel pain in anyway coz if you do feel it, it'll make you do  
   the  dont's  and not do  the  do's  as I told here.

Do/Don't.
It's our choice that leads life to take turns.
Choose happiness over anything. In the end it is what matters and you  of all
the people in world deserve to love and to be loved to the fullest.
posts.meta_description: Whether you should or not. Read more..

posts.title: F.R.I.E.N.D.S
posts.mobiledoc:
{"version":"0.3.1","markups":[],"atoms":[],"cards":[["card-markdown",{"cardName":"card-markdown","markdown":"Relax it's not about the American epic dramatic TV show. But I wish things were like that.

I'm probably not in a terrific mood today. Trust me I have my reasons.

You know what I realized, **You don't call friends "friends" when you gotta tell them what and why it is about even before calling them.
You call them friends when they pick up your line and starts listening with their full attention and give you their full ears without hesitating and most importantly not raising the *Why?* question.**

Maybe it isn't their fault after all. It might be yours. How right!
for starters, it was you who thought and called them 'friends' in the first place. Bad luck boy. It is you whose choices that made every change to this point. If you drifted away from that particular moment that made you to meet and slowly become friends, you wouldn't have become their friend and probably wouldn't have gotten this hurt.

Time isn't it. Slow as a snail and yet powerful as a knife. 
No one asked you for anything and still why are you expecting those from the ones you call friends.

I don't say every one of your friends are like that. Some doesn't bother your call and even loves to talk to you even if they're occupied with their things, and there're some who wouldn't mind calling you back as soon as you leave a missed call.

Deal with it bro. You're the one who failed in choosing the so called right 'friends' and it is not your fault you don't have a friendship like the 6 had in F.R.I.E.N.D.S.

Any Regrets? I would say NEVER coz even though everything seems out of place, We're friends and will always be.

n.b. this was purely about me and me only. I think I criticized myself. Screw it."}]],"sections":[[10,0]]}
posts.html:
Relax it's not about the American epic dramatic TV show. But I wish things were like that.

I'm probably not in a terrific mood today. Trust me I have my reasons.

You know what I realized, You don't call friends "friends" when you gotta tell them what and why it is about even before calling them.
You call them friends when they pick up your line and starts listening with their full attention and give you their full ears without hesitating and most importantly not raising the Why? question.

Maybe it isn't their fault after all. It might be yours. How right!
for starters, it was you who thought and called them 'friends' in the first place. Bad luck boy. It is you whose choices that made every change to this point. If you drifted away from that particular moment that made you to meet and slowly become friends, you wouldn't have become their friend and probably wouldn't have gotten this hurt.

Time isn't it. Slow as a snail and yet powerful as a knife.
No one asked you for anything and still why are you expecting those from the ones you call friends.

I don't say every one of your friends are like that. Some doesn't bother your call and even loves to talk to you even if they're occupied with their things, and there're some who wouldn't mind calling you back as soon as you leave a missed call.

Deal with it bro. You're the one who failed in choosing the so called right 'friends' and it is not your fault you don't have a friendship like the 6 had in F.R.I.E.N.D.S.

Any Regrets? I would say NEVER coz even though everything seems out of place, We're friends and will always be.

n.b. this was purely about me and me only. I think I criticized myself. Screw it.

them what and why it is about even before calling them.
You call them friends when they pick up your line and starts listening with
their full attention and give you their full ears without hesitating and most
importantly not raising the Why?  question.

Maybe it isn't their fault after all. It might be yours. How right!
for starters, it was you who thought and called them 'friends' in the first
place. Bad luck boy. It is you whose choices that made every change to this
point. If you drifted away from that particular moment that made you to meet and

Time isn't it. Slow as a snail and yet powerful as a knife.

posts.title: true-vision
posts.mobiledoc:
{"version":"0.3.1","markups":[],"atoms":[],"cards":[["card-markdown",{"cardName":"card-markdown","markdown":"It doesn't matter if people **praise me** or **curse me** because in the end, **I know where I stand** and that's what matters most to me. 
They give me shitty value, they praise me to the sky, they ignore me even with me standing infront of them, It never bothers me and **NEVER WILL**.

It's like a superhuman power given to me by the lord grace.
I always knew there was a reason why I could always stay away from all this praises and curses and maybe just maybe I wasn't the one who was worth all those.

I feel happy at times for myself but never too boastful about what I did good or bad. Others' feeling on those never gave me joy but my satisfaction on what I did gave me joy. 

I wish that super human power never leave me with time."}]],"sections":[[10,0]]}
posts.html:
It doesn't matter if people praise me or curse me because in the end, I know where I stand and that's what matters most to me.
They give me shitty value, they praise me to the sky, they ignore me even with me standing infront of them, It never bothers me and NEVER WILL.

It's like a superhuman power given to me by the lord grace.
I always knew there was a reason why I could always stay away from all this praises and curses and maybe just maybe I wasn't the one who was worth all those.

I feel happy at times for myself but never too boastful about what I did good or bad. Others' feeling on those never gave me joy but my satisfaction on what I did gave me joy.

I wish that super human power never leave me with time.
posts.plaintext:
It doesn't matter if people praise me  or curse me  because in the end, I know
where I stand  and that's what matters most to me.
They give me shitty value, they praise me to the sky, they ignore me even with
me standing infront of them, It never bothers me and NEVER WILL.

It's like a superhuman power given to me by the lord grace.
I always knew there was a reason why I could always stay away from all this
praises and curses and maybe just maybe I wasn't the one who was worth all
those.

I feel happy at times for myself but never too boastful about what I did good or
bad. Others' feeling on those never gave me joy but my satisfaction on what I
did gave me joy.

I wish that super human power never leave me with time.

posts.title: purge-the-truth
posts.mobiledoc:
{"version":"0.3.1","markups":[],"atoms":[],"cards":[["card-markdown",{"cardName":"card-markdown","markdown":"It was never my place even though I thought it was. As friends we faced a lot of step downs but when the day was near it's end, we worked things out, until now. There's always a first time for everything right! 

Maybe it's time I face the reality that I knew from the beginning. We were   not supposed to meet since the beginning. I always expected more from her, my best friend, my soul mate. But turns out she did the same and I couldn't reach upto her expectations.

Lot's and Lot's of people come to my life and a quite few only stays and she's one of them. 

Nothing happened but it shouldn't be like that is it?
Maybe she can't reserve time for me when she's with him, her bf. Maybe that's what happened nowadays, we are close but we are not. Last time I talked to her, I felt like I didn't know her as much as I thought I knew her. I even had thoughts about what she would've asked me when she wanted to talk that day. But she ruined it. Oh yeah, this time it was her who ruined something. She couldn't ask for somethings we both wanted. God knows why.

Maybe just maybe letting her take decisions about us and how it needed to go might be a good idea. That way I don't have to worry that much as I do now and I don't have to get in a row with her for some stupid meaningless matter.

Giving time is a must and maybe that's indeed a good idea. I got to work around my shit without her and maybe I don't need to give attention to such a person(good one) who have more things to worry about and why should I be the one to add a huge stack of pain to it.

So it's time to go in favour for both of us.

Time to say those words to the friendship we had."}]],"sections":[[10,0]]}
posts.html:
It was never my place even though I thought it was. As friends we faced a lot of step downs but when the day was near it's end, we worked things out, until now. There's always a first time for everything right!

Maybe it's time I face the reality that I knew from the beginning. We were not supposed to meet since the beginning. I always expected more from her, my best friend, my soul mate. But turns out she did the same and I couldn't reach upto her expectations.

Lot's and Lot's of people come to my life and a quite few only stays and she's one of them.

Nothing happened but it shouldn't be like that is it?
Maybe she can't reserve time for me when she's with him, her bf. Maybe that's what happened nowadays, we are close but we are not. Last time I talked to her, I felt like I didn't know her as much as I thought I knew her. I even had thoughts about what she would've asked me when she wanted to talk that day. But she ruined it. Oh yeah, this time it was her who ruined something. She couldn't ask for somethings we both wanted. God knows why.

Maybe just maybe letting her take decisions about us and how it needed to go might be a good idea. That way I don't have to worry that much as I do now and I don't have to get in a row with her for some stupid meaningless matter.

Giving time is a must and maybe that's indeed a good idea. I got to work around my shit without her and maybe I don't need to give attention to such a person(good one) who have more things to worry about and why should I be the one to add a huge stack of pain to it.

So it's time to go in favour for both of us.

Time to say those words to the friendship we had.
posts.plaintext:
It was never my place even though I thought it was. As friends we faced a lot of
step downs but when the day was near it's end, we worked things out, until now.
There's always a first time for everything right!

Maybe it's time I face the reality that I knew from the beginning. We were not
supposed to meet since the beginning. I always expected more from her, my best
friend, my soul mate. But turns out she did the same and I couldn't reach upto
her expectations.

Lot's and Lot's of people come to my life and a quite few only stays and she's
one of them.

Nothing happened but it shouldn't be like that is it?
Maybe she can't reserve time for me when she's with him, her bf. Maybe that's
what happened nowadays, we are close but we are not. Last time I talked to her,
I felt like I didn't know her as much as I thought I knew her. I even had
thoughts about what she would've asked me when she wanted to talk that day. But
she ruined it. Oh yeah, this time it was her who ruined something. She couldn't
ask for somethings we both wanted. God knows why.

Maybe just maybe letting her take decisions about us and how it needed to go
might be a good idea. That way I don't have to worry that much as I do now and I
don't have to get in a row with her for some stupid meaningless matter.

Giving time is a must and maybe that's indeed a good idea. I got to work around
my shit without her and maybe I don't need to give attention to such a
person(good one) who have more things to worry about and why should I be the one
to add a huge stack of pain to it.

So it's time to go in favour for both of us.

Time to say those words to the friendship we had.

posts.title: Pity
posts.mobiledoc:
{  "version": "0.3.1",  "markups": [],  "atoms": [],  "cards": [    ["card-markdown", {      "cardName": "card-markdown",      "markdown": "Pity. 
Pity.
Pity.
Pity.

That's what I feel now, to myself. I did something stupid, seriously.

There was a small lite talk with mom on something. I didn't agree that she was right. I was fucking overconfident. I even pretended to have more knowledge on that matter than her. 

Just after a couple of minutes later I was shocked to understand that she was right indeed. And I was wrong.

I didn't hesitate to tell her that I was wrong. I felt embarrassed. Overconfidence makes people blind. Is it just me or do you think that it is the truth. 

I hate being in such a position where I feel **Pity** for myself. I was actually condescending towards her. Poor mom. 

Now I feel bad.

Damn.

That's why there's a saying, **DON'T PITY THE DEAD, PITY THE DEAD**, I guess."    }]  ],  "sections": [[10, 0]]}
posts.html:
Pity.
Pity.
Pity.
Pity.

That's what I feel now, to myself. I did something stupid, seriously.

There was a small lite talk with mom on something. I didn't agree that she was right. I was fucking overconfident. I even pretended to have more knowledge on that matter than her.

Just after a couple of minutes later I was shocked to understand that she was right indeed. And I was wrong.

I didn't hesitate to tell her that I was wrong. I felt embarrassed. Overconfidence makes people blind. Is it just me or do you think that it is the truth.

I hate being in such a position where I feel Pity for myself. I was actually condescending towards her. Poor mom.

Now I feel bad.

Damn.

That's why there's a saying, DON'T PITY THE DEAD, PITY THE DEAD, I guess.
posts.plaintext:
Pity.
Pity.
Pity.
Pity.

That's what I feel now, to myself. I did something stupid, seriously.

There was a small lite talk with mom on something. I didn't agree that she was
right. I was fucking overconfident. I even pretended to have more knowledge on
that matter than her.

Just after a couple of minutes later I was shocked to understand that she was
right indeed. And I was wrong.

I didn't hesitate to tell her that I was wrong. I felt embarrassed.
Overconfidence makes people blind. Is it just me or do you think that it is the
truth.

I hate being in such a position where I feel Pity  for myself. I was actually
condescending towards her. Poor mom.

Now I feel bad.

Damn.

That's why there's a saying, DON'T PITY THE DEAD, PITY THE DEAD, I guess.

posts.title: angel.
posts.mobiledoc:
{"version":"0.3.1","markups":[],"atoms":[],"cards":[["card-markdown",{"cardName":"card-markdown","markdown":"I once had an angel.
Beauty like you've never seen.
Pretty like the stars in the sky.
Eyes like the wolves'.
Pure like the naked tears.
Soft as it ever could be.

And so had an angel once."}]],"sections":[[10,0]]}
posts.html:
I once had an angel.
Beauty like you've never seen.
Pretty like the stars in the sky.
Eyes like the wolves'.
Pure like the naked tears.
Soft as it ever could be.

And so had an angel once.
posts.plaintext:
I once had an angel.
Beauty like you've never seen.
Pretty like the stars in the sky.
Eyes like the wolves'.
Pure like the naked tears.
Soft as it ever could be.

And so had an angel once.

posts.title: typical-ME
posts.mobiledoc:
{"version":"0.3.1","markups":[],"atoms":[],"cards":[["card-markdown",{"cardName":"card-markdown","markdown":"I've always wondered why it was always the same **to have the want for something that you can't get and when you have it, you might not have that want anymore**.

I've been through that shit, a lot recently. And I've also felt the same on watching some "TV SHOWS" you know, some kept the eager to watch it with that "want" to see something happen but when it happened, It was never like I wanted and thought it might be.

**ClichÃ©** isn't it?

It's only till that juice that pops out of squeezed lemon and not after.


![Screenshot_20180807-110039](/content/images/2018/08/Screenshot_20180807-110039.png)
![Screenshot_20180807-110058](/content/images/2018/08/Screenshot_20180807-110058.png)
![Screenshot_20180807-110109](/content/images/2018/08/Screenshot_20180807-110109.png)

Max, from 2BrokeGirls, got that right!"}]],"sections":[[10,0]]}
posts.html:
I've always wondered why it was always the same to have the want for something that you can't get and when you have it, you might not have that want anymore.

I've been through that shit, a lot recently. And I've also felt the same on watching some "TV SHOWS" you know, some kept the eager to watch it with that "want" to see something happen but when it happened, It was never like I wanted and thought it might be.

ClichÃ© isn't it?

It's only till that juice that pops out of squeezed lemon and not after.



Max, from 2BrokeGirls, got that right!
posts.plaintext:
I've always wondered why it was always the same to have the want for something
that you can't get and when you have it, you might not have that want anymore.

I've been through that shit, a lot recently. And I've also felt the same on
watching some "TV SHOWS" you know, some kept the eager to watch it with that
"want" to see something happen but when it happened, It was never like I wanted
and thought it might be.

ClichÃ©  isn't it?

It's only till that juice that pops out of squeezed lemon and not after.





Max, from 2BrokeGirls, got that right!
